com.wikitude.architect

Interface ArchitectView.CaptureScreenCallback

  • Enclosing class:
    ArchitectView

    public static interface ArchitectView.CaptureScreenCallback
    Callback used for screen-capturing feature, also holds CaptureMode constants as public static

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int CAPTURE_MODE_CAM
      capture ONLY the camera and its content (like markers)
      static int CAPTURE_MODE_CAM_AND_WEBVIEW
      capture camera and web-view on top of it

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onScreenCaptured(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap)
      invoked when screen-capture bitmap is available
